title: ‘One Battle After Another,’ ‘Marty Supreme’ and ‘Sirāt’ Explore New Dimensions of On-Screen Fatherhood
summary: In the new film “Sirāt,” opening Feb. 6, a father is on a quest. Luis’ daughter has gone missing at a rave in Morocco; Luis (Sergi López), accompanied by his young son, Esteban (Bruno Núñez Arjona), has traveled from afar to find her. Anyone familiar with the origin of the film’s title — an Arabic …
